TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit HwndSourceParameters extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Contains the parameters that are used to create an object using the constructor.

span.span: Contains the parameters that are used to create an object using the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在使用此结构对象构造函数调用。This structure is used only in the object constructor call. 其值都根据此结构的属性不直接公开上实例时构造。The properties whose values are established by this structure are not directly exposed on instances when an is constructed. 但是，值结构通常会影响常规[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]属性，例如"高度"和"宽度"，可能存在于特定的托管对象及其[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。However, the values of the structure typically affect general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] properties such as "Height" and "Width" that might exist in specific hosted objects and their [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不构造此结构使用默认 （无参数） 构造函数的实例。Do not construct instances of this structure using the default (parameterless) constructor. 由默认构造函数创建的实例会导致，不能将其分配(即使属性看起来可设置)。An instance that is created by the default constructor results in that cannot be assigned a (even though the property appears to be settable). 如果将这种情况下应用的参数作为构造函数，生成无法显示一个窗口。If such an instance is applied as the parameters for an constructor, the resulting cannot display a window.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: Do not use the default constructor for ; see Remarks.

span.span: Do not use the default constructor for ; see Remarks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不构造此结构使用默认 （无参数） 构造函数的实例。Do not construct instances of this structure using the default (parameterless) constructor. 由默认构造函数创建的实例会导致，不能将其分配(即使属性看起来可设置)。An instance that is created by the default constructor results in that cannot be assigned a (even though the property appears to be settable). 如果将这种情况下应用的参数作为构造函数，生成无法显示一个窗口。If such an instance is applied as the parameters for an constructor, the resulting cannot display a window.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of the window.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of the window.

value.span: 窗口的宽度（以设备像素为单位）。

span.span: The height of the window, in device pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与大多数中采用矩形屏幕区域度量值的方法不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，以设备像素为单位，不是典型的独立于设备的单位指定此窗口大小。Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen-region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you specify this window size in device pixels, not the typical device-independent units. 如果需要调整你对其内容的窗口的大小，将设置到`true`。If you need to size your window to its content, set to `true`. 未设置为 0 （零）。Do not set to 0 (zero). 这样做会导致在呈现时对显著的性能产生负面影响。Doing so incurs a significant performance penalty in rendering.

summary.span: Sets the values that are used for the window size of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与大多数中采用矩形屏幕区域度量值的方法不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，以设备像素为单位，而不是在典型的独立于设备的单位指定此窗口大小。Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen-region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you specify this window size in device pixels, not in the typical device-independent units. 如果需要调整你对其内容的窗口的大小，将设置到`true`。If you need to size your window to its content, set to `true`. 不要将 0 （零） 传递为`width`或`height`参数。Do not pass 0 (zero) for either the `width` or `height` parameters. 尽管方法最终成功，即使在将传递 0，则会发生对极大的性能产生负面影响。Although the method eventually succeeds even if you do pass 0, a substantial performance penalty occurs.

member this.UsesPerPixelOpacity : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.

value.span: 如果使用每像素不透明度，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if using per-pixel opacity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过启用每像素不透明度，系统将不再绘制非工作区。By enabling per-pixel opacity, the system no longer draws the non-client area. 在桌面上绘制窗口时，将使用此透明度 (它表示一个最终呈现步骤并不显示为属性值的贡献如)。The opacity is used when the window is drawn on the desktop (it represents a final rendering step and does not appear as a contributor to property values such as ). 仅适用于顶级窗口。 applies only to top-level windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与大多数中采用矩形屏幕区域度量值的方法不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，以设备像素为单位，而不是在常见的独立于设备的单位指定此窗口的大小。Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you specify this window's size in device pixels, not in the usual device-independent units. 如果需要调整你对其内容的窗口的大小，将设置到`true`。If you need to size your window to its content, set to `true`. 未设置为 0 （零）。Do not set to 0 (zero). 这样做会导致在呈现时对极大的性能产生负面影响。Doing so incurs a substantial performance penalty in rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不构造此结构使用默认 （无参数） 构造函数的实例。Do not construct instances of this structure using the default (parameterless) constructor. 由默认构造函数创建的实例会导致，不能将其分配(即使属性看起来可设置)。An instance that is created by the default constructor results in that cannot be assigned a (even though the property appears to be settable). 如果将这种情况下应用的参数作为构造函数，生成无法显示一个窗口。If such an instance is applied as the parameters for an constructor, the resulting cannot display a window.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WindowStyle { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.WindowStyle : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the style for the window.

span.span: Gets or sets the style for the window.

value.span: 窗口样式。

span.span: The window style.

value.span: 请参阅 [CreateWindowEx] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462)样式位的完整列表的函数。

span.span: See the [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462) function for a complete list of style bits.

value.span: 默认值： WS_VISIBLE、 WS_CAPTION、 WS_SYSMENU、 WS_THICKFRAME、 WS_MINIMIZEBOX、 WS_MAXIMIZEBOX、 WS_CLIPCHILDREN

span.span: Defaults: WS_VISIBLE, WS_CAPTION, WS_SYSMENU, WS_THICKFRAME, WS_MINIMIZEBOX, WS_MAXIMIZEBOX, WS_CLIPCHILDREN

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，创建结构时设置以下 bits: WS_VISIBLE;WS_CAPTION;WS_SYSMENU;WS_THICKFRAME;WS_MINIMIZEBOX;WS_MAXIMIZEBOX;WS_CLIPCHILDREN。By default, the following bits are set when the structure is created: WS_VISIBLE; WS_CAPTION; WS_SYSMENU; WS_THICKFRAME; WS_MINIMIZEBOX; WS_MAXIMIZEBOX; WS_CLIPCHILDREN. 为标准的窗口中，你必须将 WS_CLIPCHILDREN 位进行设置。For a standard window, you must set the WS_CLIPCHILDREN bit. 中以及代码本身; 强制执行此样式位如果省略以设置此标志，WPF 会将其添加到你提供任何值。This style bit is enforced in the code itself; if you omit to set this flag, WPF adds it to whatever value you provide.
